languages.text: {n}Капеллан кивает вам приветливо, но смотрит очень цепко, будто прощупывает:{/n} "Рад познакомиться, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио. Я предпочитаю зваться Капеллан — это и имя, и занятие".

{n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан кивает вам приветливо, но смотрит очень цепко, будто прощупывает:{/n} "Рад познакомиться, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио. Я предпочитаю зваться Капеллан — это и имя, и занятие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

{n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

{n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

{n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

{n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

languages.text: {n}牧师朝你友好地点点头，但他的目光却很严肃，仿佛想看穿你是个怎样的人。{/n}“很高兴见到你，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}。我更喜欢人们称我为‘牧师’，这既是我的名字，也是我的职业。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师朝你友好地点点头，但他的目光却很严肃，仿佛想看穿你是个怎样的人。{/n}“很高兴见到你，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}。我更喜欢人们称我为‘牧师’，这既是我的名字，也是我的职业。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán asiente con simpatía, pero su mirada es intensa, como si tratara de entender quién eres.{/n} «Un placer conocer{mf|le|la}, maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio. Prefiero Capellán; es tanto mi nombre como mi trabajo».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán asiente con simpatía, pero su mirada es intensa, como si tratara de entender quién eres.{/n} «Un placer conocer{mf|le|la}, maestr{mf|o|a} Fidelio. Prefiero Capellán; es tanto mi nombre como mi trabajo».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は親しげにうなずいたが、その視線は強烈で、こちらがどんな人物であるかを精査しているようだ。{/n}「お会いできて光栄です、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ。私のことはチャプレイン、教戒官とお呼びください。私の実名であり、職業でもあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は親しげにうなずいたが、その視線は強烈で、こちらがどんな人物であるかを精査しているようだ。{/n}「お会いできて光栄です、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ。私のことはチャプレイン、教戒官とお呼びください。私の実名であり、職業でもあります」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt dir freundlich zu, aber sein Blick ist durchdringend, als wolle er erspüren, wer du bist.{/n} "Sehr erfreut, Euch kennenzulernen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio. Mich nennt bitte Ordenspriester – es ist sowohl mein Name wie auch mein Beruf."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester nickt dir freundlich zu, aber sein Blick ist durchdringend, als wolle er erspüren, wer du bist.{/n} "Sehr erfreut, Euch kennenzulernen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio. Mich nennt bitte Ordenspriester – es ist sowohl mein Name wie auch mein Beruf."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain vous salue d'un air amical, mais son regard intense vous fait comprendre qu'il est en train de vous jauger.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Je vous en prie, appelez-moi Chapelain. C'est mon nom, mais également ma fonction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain vous salue d'un air amical, mais son regard intense vous fait comprendre qu'il est en train de vous jauger.{/n} « C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Je vous en prie, appelez-moi Chapelain. C'est mon nom, mais également ma fonction. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz, dostane bir tavırla başını sallarken bir yandan da kim olduğunu anlamaya çalışıyormuş gibi yoğun bakışlarla seni süzüyor.{/n} "Tanıştığımıza çok memnun oldum Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Bana Papaz diyebilirsiniz, hem adım hem de mesleğim budur."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a friendly nod, but his gaze is intense, like he's trying to get a sense of who you are.{/n} "Pleasure to meet you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio. I prefer to go by Chaplain — it is both my name and my occupation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, dostane bir tavırla başını sallıyor ama bakışlarıyla sanki kim olduğunu anlamaya çalışıyormuş gibi seni süzüyor.{/n} "Tanıştığımıza çok memnun oldum {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio. Bana Papaz diyebilirsiniz, hem adım hem de mesleğim budur."
